meaning: thu thập, lắp ráp, tập hợp
example: We assembled in the meeting room after lunch.
I knew she was coming that afternoon because she had phoned beforehand to say so.

meaning: sự phức tạp, sự rắc rối
example: Dave couldn't find his passport at the airport and then there were further complications when Fiona lost her baggage.

meaning: người đưa tin, người đưa thư, người chuyển phát
example: I want to have this package delivered by motorcycle courier.
I folded the letter(in half) and put it in an envelope.
I like the layout of the house.

meaning: (n) sự đề cập, (v) nói đến, đề cập đếm, đề xuất
example: I'll mention your ideas to Jacinta.

meaning: (n) ‹sự/đơn› cầu xin, đơn kiến nghị, đơn thỉnh cầu,(v) cầu xin, kiến nghị
example: I signed a petition against the proposed closure of the local hospital today.
[ + that ] Do they have any proof that it was Hampson who stole the goods?

meaning: đăng ký, sổ sách, công- tơ
example: I registered the car in my name.
His helpfulness today has made me revise my original opinion/impression of him.
